snippet: The woman, who is in her 90s, was shot twice by a gunman in a moving car in the East New York section. She appeared to have been caught in a cross-fire, the police said.
abstract: Elderly woman is shot on Brooklyn street, and is in serious but stable condition; no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: The woman, who is in her 90s, was shot twice by a gunman in a moving car in the East New York section. She appeared to have been caught in a cross-fire, the police said.

headline.seo: Elderly Woman Is Shot on Brooklyn Street
